VideoStreaming: unauthorized user login The user {1} ({2}) just tried to login. Since it doesn't appear to be in the authorized users list, it needs to be moderated. Visit {3} to do it. VideoStreaming: new admin added The user {1} ({2}) was just added to the administrators list.
